pageContext.claim: “We've done a tremendous job on drugs coming into the country. If you look at some of the numbers -- we're having a news conference next week at the White House on the impact that we've had -- between opioid and all of the other problems we have -- with drugs.”
pageContext.analysis: Drug seizures at the southern border are not at record levels. The numbers for cocaine and marijuana were highest in years that predate Trump's presidency.
